alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 1:58PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light Snow and Gusty Winds Starting Wednesday Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Snowfall accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Locally higher amounts of 2 to 4 inches near Cody, Meeteetse and Clark. North winds, with gusts of 30 to 40 mph, will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern portions of the Bighorn Basin and the Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...6 PM Wednesday to 12 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times through Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
